extension.name: Meetup
extension.author: Hans Kuijpers
extension.description:
Display information of your meetup.com events

  • An API key for a valid meetup.com member account is required.
    (see Developers section on meetup.com).
  • If the group is private then the account must also be a member of the group.
  • Use MEETUP.com console for Groupd_ID retrieval. Use the field 'group_urlname'.
  • Meetup is a fork of 'NS Meet' for Joomla 2.5 by Natural Selection.
    NS Meet is a fork of 'Meetup events extension for Joomla' for Joomla 1.5 by Phuong Quan.
  • Implemented Rich Snippets for better SEO
    http://www.data-vocabulary.org/Event/

field.name: meetupApiKey
field.label: Meetup API Key (required)
field.description: API key for a valid meetup.com member account. If group is private then the account must also be a member of the group.

field.name: maxEvents
field.label: Max no. of events
field.description: Maximum number of events to show. 0=All

field.name: renderStyle
field.label: Render Style
field.description: Render each event into a 'p' or 'li' block

field.name: showEventTime
field.label: Show date and time of event
field.description: Format how this appears in the Advanced parameters

field.name: showEventVenue
field.label: Show event venue
field.description: Show the venue for the event. (Venue will not show if it is marked as private in meetup.com)

field.name: showEventLink
field.label: Show link to event
field.description: Direct link to meetup.com event page. Anchor on event title, as separate link, or not at all. Opens in new window/tab.

field.name: showNumMembers
field.label: Show the number of members
field.description: Show the number of members currently signed up to the group

field.name: eventTimeFormat
field.label: Format for date and time of event
field.description: String format for insertion into php date() function

field.name: showEventTodayAll
field.label: Show today's events all day
field.description: Events that take place on current day will continue to appear even after they have started

field.name: eventEmptyMessage
field.default: Our next event has not yet been scheduled
field.label: No events message
field.description: Message to display when no events are retrieved
